metadata.dc:author: Marcos Abdala, Hernán
Elizondo-Dueñaz, Ricardo
Rivera-Silva, Gerardo
Martínez-Menchaca, Héctor R
López-Altamirano, Marcelo
metadata.dc:description: In 1980, Yunis-Varon described this disease. Yunis-Varon syndrome is a rare autosomal recessive disease. This cleidocranial dysplasia is characterized by bone and tooth disorders, in addition tends to affect the cardiovascular system and tissues from ectoderm. This report describes the radiologic image of a patient with Yunis-Varon syndrome.
metadata.dc:title: Síndrome de Yunis-Varon.
[Yunis-Varon syndrome: a case report].
